[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/nft-metadata-crawler/src/asset_uploader/config.rs] [Struct: AssetUploaderConfig] [Credential Rotation] Is there any mechanism to rotate the cloudflare_auth_key without service disruption, or does credential compromise require complete service restart exposing the system to downtime? [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/nft-metadata-crawler/src/asset_uploader/config.rs] [Struct: AssetUploaderConfig] [Memory Safety] Are String allocations for potentially large cloudflare_image_delivery_prefix values bounded, or can unbounded allocations lead to memory exhaustion attacks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/nft-metadata-crawler/src/asset_uploader/config.rs] [Struct: AssetUploaderConfig] [Regex Validation] Is the cloudflare_account_hash format validated against Cloudflare's expected hash format, or can arbitrary strings cause API authentication failures or unexpected behavior? [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/nft-metadata-crawler/src/asset_uploader/config.rs] [Struct: AssetUploaderConfig] [API Key Format] Is the cloudflare_auth_key validated against Cloudflare's API key format requirements, or can invalid formats cause authentication bypass attempts or unexpected API behavior? [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/nft-metadata-crawler/src/asset_uploader/config.rs] [Struct: AssetUploaderConfig] [Whitespace Handling] Are leading/trailing whitespaces in cloudflare_auth_key trimmed during deserialization, or can whitespace-padded keys cause authentication failures masquerading as valid config?
